title: If no webapps deployed, accessing a URL returns 200 OK with no content instead of 404
OB: When starting a Tomcat 7 instance without any webapps deployed and accessing a URL, the server returns a HTTP code 200 OK response with no content, instead of the expected HTTP error 404.
EB: The expected behavior is that when accessing a URL on a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed, the server should return a HTTP error 404.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Download the Tomcat 7 package from http://mirror.veriportal.com/apache/tomcat/tomcat7/v7.0.0beta/bin/apachetomcat7.0.0.zip
2. Start a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed
3. Access a URL on the server
4. Observe that the server returns a HTTP code 200 OK response with no content, instead of the expected HTTP error 404.
